recordCreates.name: Copy_1_of_Create_Auto_Email_Task
recordCreates.label: Copy 1 of Create Auto Email Task

textTemplates.name: emailBody
textTemplates.text:
An update is coming to your investment lineup


Your plan’s investment fiduciary periodically reviews your forward-looking investment options to align with evolving markets and has elected to make updates to your portfolios to help improve your investment lineup.


What you need to know:

1. There is no action needed from you. The updates will automatically occur on June 10, 2024.


2. This change will update the percentage of investments within the portfolio, no changes will occur with the investments and rebalancing will only be completed for those invested in the portfolios.


3. Once the change is complete, you will be able to log into your account at myubiquity.com to view the new investments.

For more information on investment changes please visit our help center.



Thank you,

Ubiquity Retirement + Savings

value.stringValue: We're making routine updates to your investments
